name: places/ChIJ5SMT-_9YwokRHZax6p8bdZo
formattedAddress: 43 W 43rd St #171, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 43 W 43rd St #171, New York, NY 10036-7424, USA

originalText.text:
I am a musical theater producer, writer and show developer.  Over the past 15 years I worked with a well-known Broadway songwriter and lyricist on the development of a unique show. When the songwriter was approached by another producer, he used the concept from our show, and did not include me in his show’s production. The issue that he created centered on copyright infringement.
Angry and upset over this betrayal, I turned to the person who I knew would help me through this difficult situation; Ms. Leila Amineddoleh.  I have known Ms. Amineddoleh for 10 years. She is my go-to attorney for all my productions and creative works. She was aware of the circumstances regarding my creative collaboration with the songwriter.
Over the past three years, Ms. Amineddoleh represented me in a copyright infringement dispute with the songwriter and his show’s producer, director and music director.  Recently the matter was resolved due to the expert council of Ms. Amineddoleh.  She was the essential representative in handling my issue. She had expert knowledge of all legal aspects and ramifications of my case and was able to artfully and aggressively negotiate a settlement.
I highly recommend Ms. Amineddoleh to help you if you are dealing with issues involving intellectual property. An additional word of advice; if you are a creative person and are working in a collaborative relationship, seek her assistance in proactively protecting your interests.
I am more than happy to talk with you directly about my experiences working with Ms. Amineddoleh and her staff, feel free to contact her office to obtain my personal contact information.

originalText.text: I was in great hands with this law firm. Not only are the attorneys extremely knowledgeable about the law, but they work with high-level clients and know everything about the art world.
